rows.label: qst103102_msg0001
rows.name:
Mmm... Mmm-mmm... Just
a moment, please...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, it's you... Forgive me for
letting you see me in such a state.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0003
rows.name:
Travel by ship does not agree with
me... It's always been this way, but
with age, I recover more slowly.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0004
rows.name:
Thanks to that, even though I've
reached this long-awaited land,
it's painful even to stand...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0006
rows.name:
Ugh... Mm... When I raise my voice,
my headache... My apologies...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0007
rows.name:
According to the villagers... there
are three locations with murals
left by the ancient Nopon tribe.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0008
rows.name:
With the knowledge of the Nopon
tribe, I should be able to decipher
the characters drawn on them...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0009
rows.name:
Yes, yes, there is a curious
story about the murals here.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0010
rows.name:
A villager returning late at
night passed by a mural and
felt something was amiss...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0011
rows.name:
Thinking it was eerie, they went
back the next morning to check, but
nothing seemed to have changed...

rows.label: qst103102_msg0012
rows.name:
Perhaps there is some kind of mechanism
at work. If you could investigate that
as well, it would be a great help.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0101
rows.name:
There are three ancient Nopon
murals in this village.

rows.label: qst103102_msg0102
rows.name:
I am curious about the claim
that something seemed amiss
when viewed at night...
